Updated November     pm

















BioShock The Collection September  for PS4 Xbox One and PC

The critically acclaimed firstperson shooter BioShock has finally come to the current generation of consoles in the form of BioShock The Collection. this iteration includes all three of the main games and their singleplayer DLC remastered in 1080p PERIOD The collectionaims to bring in new fans of the series as well as old with the inclusion of commentary from the developers as you play PERIOD This may be2K Games way of gauging the fansinterest in a sequel to this beloved franchise which has been rumored for a while now PERIOD Fans can jump back into Rapture and begin blasting away at Big Daddies and The Little Sisters on Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

NHL  September  for PS4 and Xbox One

Though its no Blades of Steel NHL  from EA Canada looks to provide fans with an authentic ice hockeyexperience PERIOD This years game brings on the new Draft Champions mode which allows players to fantasy draft their team and take it online against other players.Fans can also look forward to more accurate goalie play with the new Own Every Zone feature PERIOD Unfortunately for PC players NHL  is only set to release on PS4 and Xbox One on Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

NBA 2K17 September  for PS4 Xbox One PS3 Xbox  and PC

Despite the lack of competition this year with no NBA Live 2K aims to build upon last years success withNBA 2K17. making a comeback in this years entry is Team USA and the legendary Dream Team from the  Olympics possibly the greatest team of basketball players ever assembled PERIOD Players who cant wait to try out the game can look forward to the My Career Prelude releasing on Sept PERIOD  on PS4 and Xbox One for free PERIOD This allows players to go ahead and set up their my player and play through college and be ready for the draftwhen the game releases fully PERIOD Thosewho preorder the game get their copies on Sept PERIOD  while everyone else can pick up theirs onSept PERIOD  PERIOD

Forza Horizon  September  for Xbox One and PC

Topping off the list for this month is the Xbox exclusive Forza Horizon . the third entry in this openworld racingseries places you at the Horizon Festival in Australia PERIOD The game includes  cars to choose from which you can customizeto your liking and show off to your friends or sell on the auction house PERIOD Outstanding graphics are a staple in the Forza franchise and this years game is no exception with stunning models of cars and the photorealistic locations youll be racing in PERIOD Playerscan expect to race their friends in the land down under on Sept PERIOD  PERIOD
